verses.roman:
iṣṭa-goṣṭhī duṅhā sane kari' kata-kṣaṇa
madhyāhna karite prabhu karilā gamana

synonyms: iṣṭa-goṣṭhī—conversation; duṅhā sane—with both Rūpa Gosvāmī and Haridāsa; kari'-doing; kata-kṣaṇa—for some time; madhya-ahna karite—to execute daily noontime duties; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; karilā gamana—left that place.
translation: He would talk for some time with them both and then leave to perform His noontime duties.
